thread.title: EL AL opens new direct Tel Aviv-Boston route
thread.title_full: EL AL opens new direct Tel Aviv-Boston route

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: EL AL opens new direct Tel Aviv-Boston route
text:
EL AL opens new direct Tel Aviv-Boston route EL AL opens new direct Tel Aviv-Boston route Details Category: Airport & Airline   10:00 El AL, Israel’s national carrier, has announced they will operate three direct flights between Tel Aviv Ben Gurion International Airport and Logan International Airport Boston on Sundays, Tuesdays and Thursdays. 
The three weekly flights to Boston will operate on a 767-300 Boeing aircraft with a streaming system for passengers’ personal entertainment experience. The planes feature 218 seats, including 22-bed like seats in Business Class and 28 seats in Economy Class Plus. EL AL CEO David Maimon said ‘‘I am pleased to inaugurate EL AL’s new route to Boston, offering a response to trends and needs in the business and tourist sectors while also promoting tourism to Israel’’. Dan Shapiro, US Ambassador to Israel said ‘‘I am excited about the opening of El AL’s nonstop flight to Boston. The route will lead to the growth of economic ties between Israel and Boston, the US capital of high tech and to close relations between the people of Boston and Israel.’’ Flights will depart Ben-Gurion Airport at 12:30am and land in Boston 12 hours and 15 minutes later at 5:45am local time. The return flights from Boston to Tel Aviv depart on Sundays, Tuesdays and Thursdays at 9pm local time and land in Israel on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays at 3:05pm Israel time. Related articles
